definition: a criminal who is associated with, usually exerts control over, and lives off the earnings of one or more prostitutes
to make use of often dishonorably for one's own gain or benefit
to customize and adorn (something, such as a car or apartment) in an ostentatious or lavish way
examples: Their backhoe had four spotlights on a bar above the cab, the same way kids pimped their pick-up trucks, and together the four beams made a wide pool of halogen brightness.
